sentences.english: Virtual machines can also provide sandboxing and isolation to limit attacks.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬機也同樣可以提供沙盒和隔離來限制可能的攻擊。

sentences.english: At the ground level an immense lawn is only interrupted by sandboxes and low vegetation arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 地面層廣袤的草坪被零星的沙盒和低矮的植被點綴。

sentences.english: But now you’r ein a sandbox and you have no permissions to do anything.
sentences.chinese: 但現在你身處沙盒之中，沒有權限執行任何東西。

sentences.english: Black Hat is accepted put make sure my websites no not get sandboxed.
sentences.chinese: 黑帽是接受把確保我的網站沒有得不到沙盒。

sentences.english: Sandboxing a third-party video player is more difficult and requires iframes at the very least.
sentences.chinese: 爲第三方視頻建立沙盒比較困難，至少需要內聯框架。

sentences.english: Locating files in the standard system directories, in both sandboxed and non-sandboxed apps.
sentences.chinese: 在沙盒和非沙盒應用程序的標準系統目錄裏定位文件。

sentences.english: How determine whether a MKS-sandbox is sparse or non-sparse from the command line?
sentences.chinese: 如何判斷一個MKS沙盒是稀疏和非稀疏從命令行嗎？

sentences.english: This Trojan operates in the same sandbox that other apps do.
sentences.chinese: 這個木馬和其他應用程序一樣運行於沙盒中。

pinyin: jue2 se4 ban4 yan3 you2 xi4

definition: online game/abbr. for 網絡遊戲|网络游戏
to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
(number of) degrees of freedom (physics and statistics)
online/network/to connect online/to connect an electronic device to another device
